About Us

1) It will be a web based application. 2) The aim of the project is to track the employee leave record to build a dynamic organization. 3) The tracking will help the organization to statistically see the leaves record of managers which will be modified by admin 4) We are using MongoDB Atlas for cloud storage backup and MongoDB Compass fetching details.
